dashboard.patient_subtitle: Here's a quick overview of your health dashboard.
dashboard.physician_subtitle: Here is a summary of your activity for today.
dashboard.book_appointment_desc: Find and schedule a consultation with a specialist.
dashboard.upload_document_desc: Add a new prescription or lab result to your records.

schedule.title: Manage Availability
schedule.subtitle: Set your weekly hours for patient appointments. Changes will be reflected in real-time.

welcome.hero_subtitle: Connect with top physicians, manage your medical records securely, and get AI-powered insights for a healthier life.
welcome.features_subheading: Experience a new era of personalized and accessible medical care.
welcome.feature1_desc: Upload and manage your prescriptions, lab results, and medical history in one encrypted, secure place.
welcome.feature2_desc: Consult with certified physicians through high-quality, secure video calls from the comfort of your home.
welcome.feature3_desc: Leverage our AI to understand potential risks, check drug interactions, and receive personalized health tips.
